name: Vinma
description: Vinma is a platform for buying and selling seconhand items, mainly furnitures. You can create an account, browse items by category, add them to your basket and create posts to sell your own items. This is a full-stack projet made with Node, Express and MongoDB for the back-end and React and Tailwind for the front-end.

name: Climate Change in South America
description: This is an interactive map of South America that evolves depending on global warming. For each country the color reflects the temperature gap between today's temperature and the average temperature at the same hour of the same day in the 60's. Higher the gap is the redder the color of each country. We fetched data from Open Meteo API ans used Adobe illustrator to design the map.

name: Social Animals
tech: Apache, Php, MySQL, PhpMyAdmin, HTML, Tailwind
description: Social Animals is a pets' social network where pets can create their account, post their cutest pictures, like other members' posts, follow users, and even attend to events! We've created our database as the structure of the project and then used Php and its Superglobals to build this social network. The CSS was entirely build using Tailwind.

name: How Many Cities
description: Enter the name of a city in the searchbar, then see on the map how many cities in the world have the exact same name.

name: Time Tracker
description: This chrome extension provides a time tracker that tracks the total time spent on each website. When activated it records your browser activity in the chrome storage API. Using Event listeners we where able to track the accurate time spent on each active tab. The pop-up allows you to to browse your time spent history by date and gives you some informations about an event on this particular day.

name: CODEV-22
description: A video game created with PICO-8. Try to come back home before codev catches you! Entirely coded in Lua this video-game was my first project at ada tech school.
